name: flarum
description: Flarum is a fast, modern web forum platform built with simplicity and extensibility in mind. It supports plugins, themes, responsive UI, and API, and provides a clean user experience similar to modern community platforms.
features: Forum: Modern web forum platform, Fast and responsive, Plugin system. Beautiful community discussions.
Extensibility: Themes and extensions. Customizable experience.
Clean UX: Modern interface design. Engaging user experience.
Mobile-Friendly: Works great on all devices. Responsive design.
Real-Time: Live updates and notifications. Dynamic experience.
Moderation: Powerful tools for community management. Quality control.
Tags: Organize discussions by topic. Structured content.
Search: Find posts quickly. Efficient discovery.
